other_tests.findings: The liver is normal in echogenicity and contour. No focal liver lesions seen. The portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. No intra- or extra-hepatic biliary dilation is identified. The CBD measures 3 mm. No stones identified within the CBD. There are multiple stones within the gallbladder. The gallbladder is more distended and there is wall thickening measuring up to 4 mm. Sonographic ___ sign was positive.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The gallbladder is more distended and there is wall thickening measuring up to 4 mm compared to the prior examination.
